data.description:
- MOVE LIKE GORILLA (physics based movement)
- DUAL SHOTGUNS (can even launch yourself by firing)
- DUAL GRAPPLE HOOKS (fly and pull yourself towards enemies)
- DUAL CHAINSAWS!
- RAGDOLL PHYSICS (knock enemies them down or send them flying)
- SANDBOX MODE with infinite possibilities!
- RETRO BOOMER-SHOOTER PIXEL ART STYLE (bloody brutal)
- FAST-PACED COMBAT (with great soundtrack)
- 15 BRUTAL LEVELS and more! (if you can beat them all)
- BOSS FIGHT!!!

Prepare to unleash your inner beast as you embark on an epic demon-slaying rampage. Engage in heart-pounding battles across a series of challenging levels, each filled with relentless demons thirsting for your destruction!

changelog.change_log: April Fools Player and Shotgun skin
NEW LEVEL 15 featuring the LASER WATCHER enemy!
New LEVEL 14 featuring THE WATCHER enemy!
Dragun Shotgun Skin Release

Version 2.21

Added:
1. SKELEGUN Shotgun Skin Challenge at Level 5
2. Fixed level ending before last enemy killed bug
3. Less smooth-turning jittering

Version 2.10

Added:
1. Fixed Grenade push bug 
2. Added Gargoyle damage textures indicating health
3. Made grenade launcher only available after level 13 
4. Gargoyle stuns when hit
5. Fixed Quest 3 avatar head clipping bug

Version 2.00

Added:
NEW Level 13
FREE Snow Rilla Skin
Boss Fight PREVIEW after Level 12
Sandbox unlocks after Level 5
Added Grenade Launcher in Sandbox
Grapple Aim Highlight on enemies
Classical Music mode
Added Grenade Launcher in Sandbox
Added Phase 2 of Vordir Boss Fight
Added PHASE 2 of Vordir Boss Fight

Version 1.999

Added:
-Boss Fight PREVIEW after Level 12
-Added Challenge Reward in Level 7
-Added optional Score System  
-Endlesss Mode in Sandbox
-Player Size control in Sandbox
-Halloween 2023 Player avatar
*Sandbox unlocks after Level 5

Version 1.998

Added:
-Added optional Score System  
-Endlesss Mode in Sandbox
-Player Size control in Sandbox
-Halloween 2023 Player avatar
*Sandbox unlocks after Level 5

Version 1.997

Added:
-Endlesss Mode in Sandbox
-Player Size control in Sandbox
-Halloween 2023 Player avatar
*Sandbox unlocks after Level 5
Build Upload Error - an error has occurred for app id

Version 1.98
Added
-Timer Mode
-Mirror Display
-Default and Lava cosmetic skins
*Bug Fix: Next level not loading or appearing

Version 1.95

-Added Level 12
-New Crawler Enemy
-Added Stick Drift Mode
-Added normal refill to Chainsword even when not empty
-Fixed player flinging from Flying Skulls with Chainsword attached

Version 1.95

-Added Level 12
-New Crawler Enemy
-Added Stick Drift Mode
-Added normal refill to Chainsword even when not empty
-Fixed player flinging from Flying Skulls with Chainsword attached

Version 1.95

-Added Level 12
-New Crawler Enemy
-Added Stick Drift Mode
-Added normal refill to Chainsword even when not empty
-Fixed player flinging from Flying Skulls with Chainsword attached

Version 1.8 NEW SANDBOX MODE

-Added Sandbox after Level 5
-Increased default Shogtun Range from 3 to 4
-Made UI Skull interactable with normal hand
-Made UI Skull interactable with Chainsword
-Victory music no longer plays if Music is toggled off
